Translations.Text: Mapa - tola purepura kara ani kami denaryammadhye samila ho'u naka
Ani sarala (ucita) tarajune tola karuna dya
Ani lokanna tyancya vastu kami karuna de'u naka ani (nirbhaya ho'una) dharativara utpata (phasada) majavita phiru naka
Ani tya allahace bhaya rakha, jyane svatah tumhala ani purvicya nirmitila nirmana kele
(Te) mhanale, tu tara tya lokampaiki ahesa, jyancyavara jadutona kela jato
Ani tu tara amacyasarakhaca eka manusya ahe ani amhi tara tula khote bolanaryampaikica samajato
Jara tumhi sacca lokampaiki asala tara amacyavara akasaca ekhada tukada kosalava
Paigambara mhanale ki majha palanakarta cangalya prakare jananara ahe, je kahi tumhi karita ahata
Yastava tyanni tyala khote tharavile, tevha tyanna savalivalya divasacya azaba (siksa- yatane) ne dharale. To mothya bhayankara divasaca azaba hota
Nihsansaya, tyata mothi nisani ahe, parantu tyancyapaiki bahusankhya loka imana rakhanare navhate
Ani nihsansaya, tumaca palanakartaca varcasvasali, dayavana ahe
Ani nihsansaya ha (kura'ana) sarva visvancya palanakartyane avatarita kela ahe
Yasa visvasta pharista (jibrila) ghe'una ala ahe
Tumacya hrdayavara (avatarala ahe) yasathi ki tumhi (lokanna) khabaradara karanaryampaiki vhave
Spasta arabi bhaseta ahe
Ani purvi ho'una gelelya paigambarancya granthammadhyehi ya (kura'ana) ci carca ahe
Kaya tyancyasathi hi nisani puresi nahi ki (kura'anacya satyatela) isra'ilacya santatice vidvanahi janatata
Ani jara amhi yala (arabi bhase'aivaji) an'ya ekhadya bhasecya vyaktivara avatarita kele asate
Tara tyane tyancyasamora yace vacana kele asate, pana yanni tyasa manale nasate
Asa prakare amhi duracari lokancya manata (inkara) dakhala kela ahe
Te joparyanta duhkhadayaka siksa- yatana (svatah) pahuna gheta nahita. To paryanta imana rakhanara nahita
Yastava to (azaba) acanaka ye'una pohocela ani tyanna tyanci kalpana (anumana) dekhila nasela
Tya veli mhanatila, kaya amhala thoda avasara (sandhi) dila ja'ila
Tara kaya he amacya siksa- yatanekarita gha'i majavita ahe
Bare, he sanga ki jara amhi tyanna varsanuvarse phayada ucalu dila
Maga tyanna to (azaba) ye'una pohocala, jya visayi tyanna bhaya dakhavale jata hote
Tara je kahi phayade tyanna pohocavile jata rahile, tyapaiki kahihi tyanna upayoga padu sakanara nahi
Ani amhi konatyahi vastila nasta kele nahi, parantu asaca sthitita ki ticyasathi khabaradara karanare hote
Bodha (upadesa) cya svarupata ani amhi atyacara karanara nahi
Ani ya (kura'ana) la saitana ghe'una ale nahita
Ani na te yacya yogya aheta, na tyanna yace samarthya ahe
Kimbahuna te tara aikanyapasunahi vancita kele gele aheta
Yastava tumhi allahacya sobata dusarya ekhadya aradhya daivatala pukaru naka an'yatha tumhihi siksa prapta karanaryampaiki vhala
Ani apalya javalacya nateva'ikanna (allahace) bhaya dakhava
Ani tyancyasi naramine vaga, jo koni imanadharaka ho'una tumacya adhina ho'ila
Jara he loka tumaci avajna karatila tara tumhi ailana kara ki tumhi je kahi karita ahata mi tyapasuna alipta ahe
Ani apala purna bharosa tyavara rakha jo varcasvasali, dayavana ahe
Jo tumhala pahata asato, jevha tumhi (namajasathi) ubhe rahata
Ani sajada karanaryammadhye tumace hindane phiranehi
Nihsansaya to (allaha) motha aikanara ani motha jananara ahe
Kaya mi tumhala sangu ki saitana konavara utaratata
Te pratyeka khotya, duracarivara utaratata
Te (varavara) aikaleli gosta pohacavitata ani tyancyapaiki bahuteka khote aheta
Ani kavince anusarana teca loka karatata, je pathabhrasta asaveta
Kaya tumhi nahi pahile ki kavi dari - darita doke apatata phiratata
Ani te je mhanatata te karata nahita

Tyancyakherija jyanni imana rakhale ani satkarme kelita ani mothya sankhyene allahaci prasansa (namahsmarana) karita rahile ani apana atyacarapidita asalyanantara suda ghetala, ani jyanni atyacara kela ahe te dekhila lavakaraca januna ghetila ki konatya kusivara ulatatata
